# [Interview #1115: Firefight Tour - El Cerrito, CA, Entry #18](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1115#18)

#### Question

Plans to make tabletop RPGs for other books?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Eventually we will do them, but not anytime soon.
